dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I sense the presence of an intruder in my realm. State your purpose, weakling.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Ha! Your words hold no weight in this fiery domain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I only seek passage through your realm, I mean no disrespect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passage? Your insolence burns brighter than my flames! You shall pay the price.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for any offense, I will leave at once.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies now? Too late. You should have thought before trespassing. Prepare to face the fury of Blazestorm!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave, I'll fight if I have to.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or stupidity? It matters not. Your fate is sealed in the blaze of my wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave your realm, I mean no trouble.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Cross me not again, lest you wish to be engulfed in flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you if you dare stand in my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge me? Your arrogance is astounding. Very well, let's see if you can withstand the heat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power and knowledge. Will you assist me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power and knowledge? Mortals are always so greedy. What makes you think I would help the likes of you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a pact of mutual benefit. Together, we can achieve great things.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A pact with you? Interesting proposition. Perhaps your ambition aligns with mine. Very well, we shall ally for now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no need for your cooperation. I will find my own path to power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn and independent. It seems you are not worth my time. Leave before you invoke my wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand respect in your domain, elemental.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Hah! Mortals are so amusing. You dare demand respect from the flames themselves?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my words. I meant no offense.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies do not quench the burning fire of insult. Begone before I reduce you to ashes!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance, flame creature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Let's see if you can back them up in the heat of battle.
